title: Shop assistant

properties.name: description
properties.value: Shop assistants can be found throughout Gielinor helping shop keepers run general stores and various specialty shops. Players can still buy and sell items from the shop assistant for the same prices as the shop keeper would offer. For information about specific shop assistants and their stores' stocks, refer to:

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Shop assistantThe RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:Shop_Assistant

Shop assistants can be found throughout Gielinor helping shop keepers run general stores and various specialty shops. Players can still buy and sell items from the shop assistant for the same prices as the shop keeper would offer. For information about specific shop assistants and their stores' stocks, refer to:

  • Shop assistant (Lumbridge)
  • Shop assistant (Varrock)
  • Shop assistant (Al Kharid)
  • Shop assistant (Falador)
  • Shop assistant (Edgeville)
  • Shop assistant (Rimmington)
  • Shop assistant (Musa Point)
  • Shop assistant (Varrock Swordshop)
  • Fairy shop assistant
 This page is used to distinguish between articles with similar names.
If an internal link led you to this disambiguation page, you may wish to change the link to point directly to the intended article.
rawContent:
{{External|rs|rsc=Shop_Assistant}}
'''Shop assistants''' can be found throughout [[Gielinor]] helping [[shop keeper]]s run [[general store]]s and various specialty shops. Players can still buy and sell [[items]] from the shop assistant for the same prices as the shop keeper would offer. For information about specific shop assistants and their stores' stocks, refer to:
*[[Shop assistant (Lumbridge)]]
*[[Shop assistant (Varrock)]]
*[[Shop assistant (Al Kharid)]]
*[[Shop assistant (Falador)]]
*[[Shop assistant (Edgeville)]]
*[[Shop assistant (Rimmington)]]
*[[Shop assistant (Musa Point)]]
*[[Shop assistant (Varrock Swordshop)]]
*[[Fairy shop assistant]]

{{Disambig}}
